message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $13,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $13,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $10,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product to me is quite high.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. How about we settle at $10,750?
